members.name: baseUrl
contractHash

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a client-side interpreter that proxies all operations to a server.
 *
 * Each handler resolves its TypedNode children via `eval_()`, then sends the resolved data to `{baseUrl}/mvfm/execute` as a JSON POST.
 *
 * @param options - Handler options.
 *
 * @param nodeKinds - Node kinds to create handlers for.
 *
 * @returns An Interpreter that proxies all operations to the server.
 */
members.name: clientInterpreter

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a unified evaluator using the slack server interpreter.
 *
 * @param client - The {@link SlackClient} to execute against.
 *
 * @param baseInterpreter - Base interpreter for evaluating sub-expressions.
 *
 * @returns An async AST evaluator function.
 */
members.name: serverEvaluate

members.docComment:
/**
 * Creates a server-side interpreter for `slack/*` node kinds.
 *
 * @param client - The {@link SlackClient} to execute against.
 *
 * @returns An Interpreter for slack node kinds.
 */
members.name: serverInterpreter

members.docComment:
/**
 * Slack plugin factory. Namespace: `slack/`.
 *
 * Creates a plugin that exposes chat, conversations, users, reactions, and files resource methods for building parameterized Slack API call AST nodes.
 *
 * @param config - A {@link SlackConfig} with a token.
 *
 * @returns A PluginDefinition for the slack plugin.
 */
members.name: slack

members.docComment:
/**
 * Wraps a `@slack/web-api` `WebClient` instance into the abstract {@link SlackClient} interface consumed by the slack handler.
 *
 * This adapter decouples the handler from the concrete SDK, allowing tests to substitute mock clients while production code uses the real `WebClient`.
 *
 * @param client - The `@slack/web-api` `WebClient` instance to wrap.
 *
 * @returns A {@link SlackClient} that delegates to the underlying `WebClient`
 */
members.name: wrapSlackWebClient
